We don't need any encourag-mint to enjoy #MintJulepDay! Enjoy this fresh take on the traditional Kentucky Derby cocktail üçÉLast Man StandingüçÉ crafted by @theweekendmixologist.

üçÉ 1 oz Cognac
üçÉ ¬Ω oz Jamaican Rum
üçÉ ¬æ oz Amaro CioCiaro
üçÉ 1 Teaspoon Peach Liqueur
üçÉ 6-8 Mint leaves

To your glass, add mint leaves and peach liqueur and softly muddle. Add remaining ingredients and then fill half way with crushed ice. Stir and then top with ice. Garnish with fresh mint, a slice of peach and top with powdered sugar.

The Mr. D by the @stregishk is inspired by Diedrich Knickerbocker, a famous Broadway character on its famed stages. This light and bright drink is complimented with dill and parsley give a savory edge, completed with Red Fig in a Moreish highball.‚Å†

üåø15ml Dill & Parsley Honey ‚Å†
üåøTop Fever Tree Tonic Water ‚Å†

‚Å†
Combine all of the ingredients except the Tonic Water into the shaker. Shake and Fine strain into a chilled Cristal de Paris 'Astor' Highball Glass, Top with Fever Tree Tonic water.

For #womenshistorymonth @allisonparc explains the history and significance of the Salonni—êre cocktail created by Mary Kelly (@marykellydc) using @BrenneWhisky as she and the women featured in her interview reflect on 20 years of progress. This modern cocktail takes blending French Single Malt Whiskey with vermouth and Tiki bitters to hit all the classic points of a Rob Roy and incorporates plum, Drambuie for Honey & Heather, and a glass rinse of peaty scotch for fruit and smoke. Follow the üîó link in bio to get the full recipe and read more of Allison‚Äôs interview with Georgie Bell (@bellswhisky), Nicola Riske (@nriske), Tracie Franklin (@spirited_tracie)‚Å†, and Heather Greene (@thewhiskeyauthority

Milk & Whiskers by @ella.beverlyhills is a clarified milk punch that is shaken and served up. The whey proteins left over from the clarification emulsifies and creates a perfect foam topper similar to an egg white sour.‚Å†
‚Å†
Milk & Whiskers üç∏ ‚Å†
‚Ä¢ 2 oz Toasted Pecan infused Maker‚Äôs Mark Bourbon‚Å†
‚Ä¢ 0.75 oz Fresh Lemon Juice‚Å†
‚Ä¢ 1/2 oz Maple Syrup‚Å†
‚Ä¢ 1/4 oz Orange/Lemon Oleo Saccharum‚Å†
‚Ä¢  4 dashes Fee Bros. Aztec Chocolate Bitters‚Å†
‚Å†
Combine with 1.25 oz whole milk, rest and strain through coffee filter.‚Å†
Shake with 2 Kold Draft cubes until silent. Serve up. üç∏

For #worldbartenderday we celebrate YOU, the bartender - the community that has made Tales of the Cocktail Foundation possible. Today is a day to celebrate the bar tending craft, and all of those who continue on the tradition. As one of the world's oldest professions - bartending is a skilled craft that promotes innovation, knowledge, and creativity and it is these traits that continue to push the drinks industry forward year after year. So, help us in celebrating World Bartender Day - pull up a stool at your local bar and thank the one's pouring you your favorite spirit.‚Å†
